snippet: An Army nurse deployed in Afghanistan showed no alarm or discomfort before suddenly collapsing during a Skype video chat with his wife, who saw a bullet hole in a closet behind him.
abstract: Wife of deceased Army nurse Capt Bruce Kevin Clark details Skype call she had with her husband, during which he suddenly slumped forward, revealing a bullet hole in a closet behind him.
lead_paragraph: An Army nurse deployed in Afghanistan showed no alarm or discomfort before suddenly collapsing during a Skype video chat with his wife, who saw a bullet hole in a closet behind him.

headline.main: Wife Describes Death of Army Nurse
headline.print_headline: Wife Describes Death of Army Nurse
